derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French surtaxe (see sur-, tax)

entry.tran: (对超过一定金额的收入征收的)附加税
entry.def: Surtax is an additional tax on incomes higher than the level at which ordinary tax is paid.

example.ex: ...a 10% surtax for Americans earning more than $250,000 a year.
example.tran: 对于年收入在 25 万美元以上的美国人征收的 10%的附加税

means.word_mean: 1. an additional tax on certain kinds of income that has already been taxed

sentences.sentence: "surtax luxury items that cost more than $1,000"

auth_sentence.content: House Democrats want to impose a surtax on wealthy individuals.
auth_sentence.res_content: House Democrats want to impose a surtax on wealthy individuals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: House Democrats want to impose a surtax on wealthy individuals.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"; 2. 表示"超过,在……上面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sur在下面;随后+rept爬+itious……的→在下面爬→鬼鬼崇崇的
sur超过,在……上面+plus多余;加→多出很多
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
surround[v.包围]+ing表名词→被围起来的状态→环境
sur超过,在……上面+charge费用→额外的收费→附加费
sur超过,在……上面+realism现实主义→n.超现实主义
sur超过,在……上面+veil面纱+lance→在面纱上看[隔了一层纱]看→临视
sur超过,在……上面+viv生命+al表名词→经过事故活着→幸存
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
sur在下面;随后+round圆圈→在下面围一圈
sur超过,在……上面+mount山→在山上→登上
sur超过,在……上面+pass通过→在上面通过→超越
